articles.author: Alexander Ward, Gabriele Steinhauser, Meridith McGraw
articles.title: The Effort to Court Trump Abroad: Deals, Flattery and Jet Fighters - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Lavish welcoming ceremonies and nominations for the Nobel Peace Prize are part of foreign leaders’ charm offensives when the American president comes to town
articles.content:
KUALA LUMPUR, MalaysiaWorld leaders have developed something of a blueprint for President 
Trump when he comes to visit: produce a lavish welcoming ceremony and launch a charm offensive in hopes of … [+543 chars]
